General.Name: Hyundai Bngste
General.Description: Hyundai Bng Steel Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells stainless steel products and automobile parts in South Korea. The company offers stainless cold rolled steel sheets; and iron/aluminum precision sand casting parts for automobiles. It serves automotive, construction, IT, and electronics industries. The company was formerly known as BNG Steel Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hyundai Bng Steel Co., Ltd. in March 2011. Hyundai Bng Steel Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Changwon, South Korea.
